screenshot.caption: DF2 file open in Defractor 0.97

description: Defractor is a synthesizer that enables you to create .RAW , .XI , and .WAV samples by playing various instruments. Jenner Fusari developed Defractor in the 1990s.
The Defractor installation includes DF2 and DFC instruments in the Instruments folder in the installation. You can also create DF2 instruments with Defractor.
To save an instrument as a DF2 file: Select File â†’ Save Instrument . Choose "Defractor Enhanced Instrument" from the "Save as type" dropdown menu. Click Save .
